description: Try our easy to follow Crispy Salmon With Chimichurri recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Fish dishes,Pescatarian,Quick & easy dinner,High fibre,High protein,Low salt,Low sugar,Easter,Salmon
name: Crispy Salmon With Chimichurri Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 lemon, rind finely grated (save 1 tbs lemon juice)
1 oak leaf lettuce, leaves separated, torn

recipeInstructions.text: Cook chips according to packet directions.

Process parsley, coriander leaves and oregano leaves in a food processor in short bursts until roughly chopped. Add garlic and chilli. Process until just combined. With motor running, gradually add oil. Add vinegar, lemon rind and lemon juice.

Pat dry salmon fillets. Remove bones. Heat oil in a large non-stick frying pan over medium-high heat. Add salmon, skin-side down. Cook for 4 minutes until crisp. Turn and cook for 3-4 minutes or until cooked to your liking.
Meanwhile, combine lettuce, tomatoes and cucumber in a bowl. Season. Serve salmon with chimichurri, fries and salad.
